# httpServer

**Instance Property**

An [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEProxyServer] object containing the static HTTP proxy server settings.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var httpServer: NEProxyServer? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEProxySettings/autoProxyConfigurationEnabled] is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] and [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEProxySettings/httpEnabled] is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], then the proxy server specified in this property will be used for HTTP connections.

## Related Documentation

- **autoProxyConfigurationEnabled**: A Boolean indicating if proxy auto-configuration is enabled.

## Accessing Manual Proxy Properties

- **httpEnabled**: A Boolean indicating if a static HTTP proxy will be used.
- **httpsEnabled**: A Boolean indicating if a static HTTPS proxy will be used.
- **httpsServer**: An [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEProxyServer] object containing the static HTTPS proxy server settings.
- **NEProxyServer**: `NEProxyServer` contains settings for a proxy server.
